text: Saint-Géréon was a commune in the Loire-Atlantique department in western France. On 1 January 2019, it became part of the new commune of Ancenis-Saint- Géréon. == Related pages == * Communes of the Loire-Atlantique department == References == == Other websites == * INSEE commune file Category:2019 disestablishments in France Category:Former communes in Loire-Atlantique
title: Saint-Géréon
